articles.author: Tom Whipple, Science Editor
articles.title: More medical breakthroughs on the way thanks to BioNTech coronavirus vaccine - The Times
articles.description: Saving the world was, for Dr Katalin Kariko, always a sideline. After a busy year producing the world’s first, and currently most effective, coronavirus vaccine, she is keen to return to the day job.

articles.author: Adam Chapman
articles.title: Coronavirus new strain symptoms: Seven new symptoms that aren’t the ‘classic three’ - Express
articles.description: THE NEW strains of coronavirus are running amok in the UK, with people testing positive for both the Kent and South African strains. Amid this snowballing situation, local public health leaders are urging their citizens to recognise the full range of possible…
